title: La Nariz
subtitle: The Nose
meta_desc: Learn about the nose in Spanish (nariz, oler, respirar, estornudar) with audio pronunciation and word highlighting. Ages 2-5.
keywords: learn Spanish body parts, la nariz Spanish, nose in Spanish, bilingual children books, Spanish vocabulary kids
